array.string: Use the **Move** tool to move the instrument graphics closer to the center (for a higher pitch), or farther away (for a lower pitch).
Two instrument tools are provided for you, but you can change them or add more. Scroll down to `// Add instrument tools` in the code.
Try sliding your finger around over the instrument graphics.
Don’t limit yourself to instruments—you can add a tool to play sound effects or to speak text.
